pulling together

2002-05-15

Thankfully i did not fail my philosophy class... Actually did much the opposite. I'm afraid to see the TA around campus tho... the last impression was that exam I bombed so horribly.

... which means I'll be able to do my thesis.

Flicker gave me a roll of super 8, i think i'll give it to Aisling, cuz she has a super 8 camera. Mine's not-so-super 8... more like bland 8, i guess you would say.

Somebody at flicker said phase 5 was beautifully shot... I wonder if he is a podifile?

I also wonder if kudzu makes good baskets.
